sprint_goal: Establish foundational infrastructure, CI/CD, and core authentication backend logic. Prove WebSocket architecture viability via PoC.
epic_coverage: API Gateway Core Infrastructure and Setup
key_deliverables: Deployed API Gateway, functional CI pipeline, complete JWT Authorizer backend, WebSocket PoC results, dev tooling setup.
demo_objectives: Show CI pipeline failing/passing on PRs. Demonstrate JWT authorizer rejecting invalid tokens via API client. Present WebSocket PoC findings and recommendation.
success_criteria: All Sprint 1 tasks complete. JWT Authorizer passes all unit and integration tests. WebSocket PoC is complete and a decision is made.
risk_factors: High risk on WebSocket architecture viability (RISK-003). Security risk of custom JWT Authorizer (RISK-001).
mitigation_strategies: Time-boxed PoC for WebSockets. Rigorous testing and security review for authorizer.
integration_windows: Integration testing for JWT Authorizer on day 8-9.

sprint_goal: Implement core data resolvers (Auth, Profile), enable real-time communication via WebSockets, and establish a full observability stack. Automate deployment to staging.
epic_coverage: API Gateway Core Infrastructure and Setup
key_deliverables: Functional login/register/profile queries. Deployed WebSocket API. Automated deployment to staging. Full observability stack (logging, tracing, alarms).
demo_objectives: Demonstrate user login and profile viewing through the API. Show a real-time chat/notification example using the WebSocket API. Show a request trace in X-Ray. Show a successful automated deployment to staging.
success_criteria: All Sprint 2 tasks complete. Core user features are testable end-to-end. WebSocket API is functional. CD pipeline is operational.
risk_factors: Performance latency (RISK-002, RISK-004). CI/CD pipeline slowness (RISK-006). Integration failures due to schema drift (RISK-005).
mitigation_strategies: Implementation of DataLoaders with performance tests. Parallel CI jobs. Automated contract testing.
external_dependencies: Stable gRPC microservices in the dev environment.
integration_windows: End-to-end feature testing throughout the sprint as services become available.
burndown_target: Linear burndown with 50% completion by day 5.
